column3: On March 20 2019 the EC announced its decision that certain contractual provisions in agreements that

column1: Google had with AdSense for Search partners infringed European competition law. The EC decision imposed a fine

column7: as of March 20 2019 and directed actions related to AdSense for Search partners'

column1: agreements which we implemented prior to the decision. On June 4 2019 we appealed the EC decision. We

column8: for the fine in the first quarter of 2019.
